KEY.Updata: 技能的等级不能在这里修改

GROUP.Data: 神圣一击开关
GROUP.Content: RESULT = (1-[GodHitSwitch1])

GROUP.Data: 总伤害减免
GROUP.Content: RESULT = min(DIV(SUB(100,[GetHurtResistance2]),100),1.5)

GROUP.Data: 神圣攻击
GROUP.Content: RESULT = [HolyHitDamage1]-[HolyDef2]

GROUP.Data: XP伤害减免
GROUP.Content: RESULT = min(DIV(SUB(10000,[XPHurtSub2]),10000),1.5)

GROUP.Data: 治疗效果加成结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT =min((1+DIV([HealAdd1]+[BeHealAdd2],10000)),2.5)

GROUP.Data: 物理攻击计算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = Group(1001/*物理抗性结算*/)*SUB(RAD([PhysicsAttackMin1]*(1-[LuckSwitch1])+[PhysicsAttackMax1]*[LuckSwitch1],[PhysicsAttackMax1]),GRT([LuckSwitch1],0.5)?([PhysicsDef2]*[TagLuckyDef]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])):([PhysicsDef2]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])))

GROUP.Data: 魔法攻击计算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = Group(1002/*魔法抗性结算*/)*SUB([MagicAttack1],GRT([LuckSwitch1],0.5)?([MagicDef2]*[TagLuckyDef])*(1-[GodHitSwitch1]):([MagicDef2]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])))

GROUP.Data: 四元素攻击结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = [FireAttack1]*Group(1004/*火元素抗性结算*/)+[FrostAttack1]*Group(1005/*冰元素抗性结算*/)+[LightAttack1]*Group(1006/*光元素抗性结算*/)+[DarkAttack1]*Group(1007/*暗元素抗性结算*/)

GROUP.Data: 无消抗物理攻击计算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = SUB(RAD([PhysicsAttackMin1]*(1-[LuckSwitch1])+[PhysicsAttackMax1]*[LuckSwitch1],[PhysicsAttackMax1]),GRT([LuckSwitch1],0.5)?([PhysicsDef2]*[TagLuckyDef]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])):([PhysicsDef2]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])))

GROUP.Data: 无消抗魔法攻击计算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = SUB([MagicAttack1],GRT([LuckSwitch1],0.5)?([MagicDef2]*[TagLuckyDef])*(1-[GodHitSwitch1]):([MagicDef2]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])))

GROUP.Data: 战士四元素消抗攻击结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = [FireAttack1]*Group(102/*战士火元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[FrostAttack1]*Group(103/*战士冰元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[LightAttack1]*Group(104/*战士光元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[DarkAttack1]*Group(105/*战士暗元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)

GROUP.Data: 骑士四元素消抗攻击结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = [FireAttack1]*Group(202/*骑士火元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[FrostAttack1]*Group(203/*骑士冰元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[LightAttack1]*Group(204/*骑士光元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[DarkAttack1]*Group(205/*骑士暗元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)

GROUP.Data: 刺客四元素消抗攻击结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = [FireAttack1]*Group(302/*刺客火元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[FrostAttack1]*Group(303/*刺客冰元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[LightAttack1]*Group(304/*刺客光元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[DarkAttack1]*Group(305/*刺客暗元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)

GROUP.Data: 法师四元素消抗攻击结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = [FireAttack1]*Group(402/*法师火元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[FrostAttack1]*Group(403/*法师冰元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[LightAttack1]*Group(404/*法师光元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[DarkAttack1]*Group(405/*法师暗元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)

GROUP.Data: 牧师四元素消抗攻击结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = [FireAttack1]*Group(502/*牧师火元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[FrostAttack1]*Group(503/*牧师冰元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[LightAttack1]*Group(504/*牧师光元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[DarkAttack1]*Group(505/*牧师暗元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)

GROUP.Data: 召唤四元素消抗攻击结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = [FireAttack1]*Group(602/*召唤火元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[FrostAttack1]*Group(603/*召唤冰元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[LightAttack1]*Group(604/*召唤光元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)+[DarkAttack1]*Group(605/*召唤暗元素消抗和隐性消抗结算*/)

GROUP.Data: 带等级压制的怪物物理攻击
GROUP.Content: RESULT = Group(1001/*物理抗性结算*/)*SUB(RAD([PhysicsAttackMin1]*(1-[LuckSwitch1])+[PhysicsAttackMax1]*[LuckSwitch1],[PhysicsAttackMax1])*Group(1003/*等级压制结算*/),GRT([LuckSwitch1],0.5)?([PhysicsDef2]*[TagLuckyDef]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])):([PhysicsDef2]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])))

GROUP.Data: 带等级压制的怪物魔法攻击
GROUP.Content: RESULT = Group(1002/*魔法抗性结算*/)*SUB([MagicAttack1]*Group(1003/*等级压制结算*/),GRT([LuckSwitch1],0.5)?([MagicDef2]*[TagLuckyDef])*(1-[GodHitSwitch1]):([MagicDef2]*(1-[GodHitSwitch1])))

GROUP.Data: 带等级压制的怪物全攻击
GROUP.Content: RESULT = Group(1013/*带等级压制的怪物物理攻击*/)+Group(1014/*带等级压制的怪物魔法攻击*/)+Group(1010/*怪物1倍四元素攻防结算*/)

GROUP.Data: 带等级压制的怪物物理攻击反向结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = Group(1001/*物理抗性结算*/)*SUB(RAD([PhysicsAttackMin2]*(1-[LuckSwitch2])+[PhysicsAttackMax2]*[LuckSwitch2],[PhysicsAttackMax2])*Group(1003/*等级压制结算*/),[PhysicsDef1]*(1-[GodHitSwitch2])*(1-[LuckSwitch2]))

GROUP.Data: 带等级压制的怪物魔法攻击反向结算
GROUP.Content: RESULT = Group(1002/*魔法抗性结算*/)*SUB([MagicAttack2]*Group(1003/*等级压制结算*/),[MagicDef1]*(1-[GodHitSwitch2])*(1-[LuckSwitch2]))
